(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT the) (NN oyster) (NNS lovers)))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(one-3, This-1)
cop(one-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, one-3)
prep(one-3, for-4)
det(lovers-7, the-5)
nn(lovers-7, oyster-6)
pobj(for-4, lovers-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Imagine)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN plate))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (NN hokkien) (NN mee))
            (VP (VBN topped)
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ rich) (NN seafood) (NN sauce))
                  (VP (VBN made)
                    (PP (IN from)
                      (NP (NNS prawns)))
                    (, ,)))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, Imagine-1)
det(plate-3, a-2)
dobj(Imagine-1, plate-3)
prep(plate-3, of-4)
nn(mee-6, hokkien-5)
pobj(of-4, mee-6)
partmod(mee-6, topped-7)
prep(topped-7, with-8)
det(sauce-12, a-9)
amod(sauce-12, rich-10)
nn(sauce-12, seafood-11)
pobj(with-8, sauce-12)
partmod(sauce-12, made-13)
prep(made-13, from-14)
pobj(from-14, prawns-15)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADJP (JJ sotong)
      (CC and)
      (JJ oysters))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, sotong-1)
cc(sotong-1, and-2)
conj(sotong-1, oysters-3)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Ooh) (: ...)))


root(ROOT-0, Ooh-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (S
        (NP (NN gotta))
        (VP (VB be)
          (VP (VBN shiok)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(has-2, it-1)
root(ROOT-0, has-2)
nsubjpass(shiok-5, gotta-3)
auxpass(shiok-5, be-4)
ccomp(has-2, shiok-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Shiok)
      (ADJP (JJ enough)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB get)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN guy))
                (PP (IN like)
                  (NP (NNP Cactuskit))))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB visit)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN place))
                    (PP
                      (NP (CD 4) (NNS times))
                      (IN over)
                      (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (CD three) (NNS weeks)))))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Shiok-1)
acomp(Shiok-1, enough-2)
aux(get-4, to-3)
xcomp(enough-2, get-4)
det(guy-6, a-5)
dobj(get-4, guy-6)
prep(guy-6, like-7)
pobj(like-7, Cactuskit-8)
aux(visit-10, to-9)
xcomp(get-4, visit-10)
det(place-12, the-11)
dobj(visit-10, place-12)
num(times-14, 4-13)
npadvmod(over-15, times-14)
prep(visit-10, over-15)
det(weeks-19, the-16)
amod(weeks-19, last-17)
num(weeks-19, three-18)
pobj(over-15, weeks-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Skiok)
      (ADJP (JJ enough)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB get)
              (S
                (NP (PRP him))
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB persuade)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP me))
                      (VP
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB eat)
                            (ADVP (RB there))
                            (NP (CD three) (NNS times))))
                        (CC and)
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB bend)
                            (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS arms))
                            (S
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB give)
                                  (NP (PRP it))
                                  (NP (DT a) (JJR higher) (NN score)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Skiok-1)
acomp(Skiok-1, enough-2)
aux(get-4, to-3)
xcomp(enough-2, get-4)
nsubj(persuade-7, him-5)
aux(persuade-7, to-6)
xcomp(get-4, persuade-7)
nsubj(eat-10, me-8)
aux(eat-10, to-9)
ccomp(persuade-7, eat-10)
advmod(eat-10, there-11)
num(times-13, three-12)
dobj(eat-10, times-13)
cc(eat-10, and-14)
aux(bend-16, to-15)
conj(eat-10, bend-16)
poss(arms-18, my-17)
dobj(bend-16, arms-18)
aux(give-20, to-19)
xcomp(bend-16, give-20)
iobj(give-20, it-21)
det(score-24, a-22)
amod(score-24, higher-23)
dobj(give-20, score-24)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Shiok)
      (ADJP (JJ enough)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB get)
              (S
                (NP (PRP him))
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB organize)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ special) (NN supper))
                    (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                      (S
                        (NP (DT the) (JJ other) (NNS kakis))
                        (VP (MD can)
                          (VP (VB savor)
                            (NP (PRP$ its) (NNS shiokness))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Shiok-1)
acomp(Shiok-1, enough-2)
aux(get-4, to-3)
xcomp(enough-2, get-4)
nsubj(organize-7, him-5)
aux(organize-7, to-6)
xcomp(get-4, organize-7)
det(supper-10, a-8)
amod(supper-10, special-9)
dobj(organize-7, supper-10)
advmod(savor-17, so-11)
mark(savor-17, that-12)
det(kakis-15, the-13)
amod(kakis-15, other-14)
nsubj(savor-17, kakis-15)
aux(savor-17, can-16)
advcl(organize-7, savor-17)
poss(shiokness-19, its-18)
dobj(savor-17, shiokness-19)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Man))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Man-1)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN if)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN plate))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NN hokkien) (NN mee))))
      (VP (MD can)
        (VP (VB drive)
          (NP (PRP him))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB do)
                (NP (PDT all) (DT this))))
            (, ,)))))))


mark(drive-8, if-1)
det(plate-3, a-2)
nsubj(drive-8, plate-3)
prep(plate-3, of-4)
nn(mee-6, hokkien-5)
pobj(of-4, mee-6)
aux(drive-8, can-7)
root(ROOT-0, drive-8)
dobj(drive-8, him-9)
aux(do-11, to-10)
xcomp(drive-8, do-11)
predet(this-13, all-12)
dobj(do-11, this-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP wonder)
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP what))
        (S
          (NP (PRP he))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (PP (IN like)
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB when))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP he))
                  (VP (VBD was)
                    (VP (VBG pursuing)
                      (NP (PRP$ his) (NN wife)))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(wonder-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, wonder-2)
dobj(was-5, what-3)
nsubj(was-5, he-4)
ccomp(wonder-2, was-5)
prep(was-5, like-6)
advmod(pursuing-10, when-7)
nsubj(pursuing-10, he-8)
aux(pursuing-10, was-9)
pcomp(like-6, pursuing-10)
poss(wife-12, his-11)
dobj(pursuing-10, wife-12)
